artifacts.summary: Documents archival of failed truth lemma approaches and designation of semantic_weak_completeness as canonical completeness theorem
Documents why MCSDerivedWorldState, AlgebraicSemanticBridge, and HybridCompleteness approaches failed

completion_data.completion_summary: Archived 3 failed truth lemma approaches (MCSDerivedWorldState, AlgebraicSemanticBridge, HybridCompleteness) to Boneyard/Metalogic_v3/FailedTruthLemma/. Documented semantic_weak_completeness as THE canonical sorry-free completeness theorem. Updated documentation throughout Metalogic/ to mark truth lemma gap as architectural limitation, not future work.
